relation: Spectrum’s ‘Big Fat Greek Fries’ A pile of hand-cut fries topped with imported feta cheese and a touch of oregano
Spicy Cheese Fries A pile of hand-cut fries topped with a zesty melted cheese sauce
Pita bread Soft, fluffy pita bread grilled and served up piping hot
Extra Dipping Sauces Barbecue, hot sauce, ranch, blue cheese, garlic, sweet and sour, marinara, and tzatziki sauce
